price: 你们可以吃那些植物，可以放牧你们的牲畜。对于有理智者，此中确有许多迹象。
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱرۡعَوۡاْ أَنۡعَٰمَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ir'ʿaw anʿāmakum inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
